translations: v.使处于不利地位，不公正地对待；处罚，惩罚，处以刑罚；（体育运动中）判罚

phrs.translation: 处罚, 惩罚, 是不利, 对
处罚, 是不利, 惩罚, 对

sentences.sentence: Mr. Gill said the city could penalize the company if it did not complete the work on schedule.
sentences.translation: 吉尔先生说，如果该公司没有按时完成工作，市政府将对其进行处罚。

sentences.sentence: The new law appears to penalize the poorest members of society.
sentences.translation: 新法规似乎不利于社会中的最贫困者。

sentences.sentence: The professor will penalize lightly for late assignments.
sentences.translation: 教授会对迟交作业进行轻度惩罚。
